name: Not In My Back Yard!
description:
This is a game about being assigned the role of placing wind turbines in the countryside. You not only have to deal with natural obstacles but also with angry house-owners who insist of not having the turbines in THEIR back yard.

Your job is to place the turbines in the most efficient positions, where the power production is estimated by the following rules:

  • The wind value of the tile the turbine is on
  • Half of the wind value of each neighboring tile
  • Forests next to the tile take away 10 per cent of the wind value
  • Buildings make the wind value zero
  • Wind coming from mountains is not halved, but rather multiplied by 2
  • Wind turbines next to houses make energy production negative
  • Wind turbines next to each other make each turbine only a quarter as efficient

You can only turbine grass (green) tiles by clicking on them.
